com.wookler.server.common

Class Monitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wookler.server.common.Monitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable

    public class Monitor
extends Object
implements Configurable
    Monitor class encapsulates the monitoring functionality for the application.
    Author:
    Subho Ghosh (subho dot ghosh at outlook.com)

      Exception class used to relay errors encountered by the application monitor.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public void configure(ConfigNode config)
               throws ConfigurationException
        Configure the monitor thread. Sample: 
         
     <monitor>
         <params>
             <param name="app.name" value="[APP NAME]"/>
             
	<param name="monitor.window.recycle" value="[Counter Recycle Window]"/>
             
	<param name="monitor.frequency.write" value="[Metrics Write Frequency]"/>
         </params>
         <counter class="[Counter Logger Class]">...</counter>
         <heartbeat class="[Heartbeat Logger Class]]>...</heartbeat>
     </monitor>
        Specified by:
        configure in interface Configurable
        Parameters:
        config - - Configuration node for this instance.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Dispose the monitor thread.
        Specified by:
        dispose in interface Configurable

      • addGlobalCounter

        public AbstractCounter addGlobalCounter(AbstractCounter counter)
        Add a global (synchronized) counter to the cache.
        Parameters:
        counter - - Global counter to register.
        Returns:
        - Added local counter instance.

      • getGlobalCounter

        public AbstractCounter getGlobalCounter(String namespace,
                                        String name)
        Get the instance of a registered global counter.
        Parameters:
        namespace - - Counter namespace.
        name - - Counter name.
        Returns:
        - Counter or NULL if not found.

      • register

        public boolean register(MonitoredThread thread)
        Register a thread instance to be monitored.
        Parameters:
        thread - - Thread instance.
        Returns:
        - Registration succeeded?

      • unregister

        public boolean unregister(MonitoredThread thread)
        Unregister the specified thread instance.
        Parameters:
        thread - - Thread instance.
        Returns:
        - Removal succeeded?

        - Default Time Window.

      • run

        public void run()
         throws Monitor.MonitorException
        Runnable implementation.
        Throws:
        Monitor.MonitorException

      • create

        public static void create(ConfigNode config)
                   throws Monitor.MonitorException
        Initialize the application monitor. Should only be invoked at the create of the application.
        Parameters:
        config - - Configuration node.
        Throws:
        Monitor.MonitorException

      • start

        public static void start()
                  throws Monitor.MonitorException
        Start the monitor thread. The start call should be invoked after the Task Manager has been initialized.
        Throws:
        Monitor.MonitorException

      • get

        public static Monitor get()
                   throws Monitor.MonitorException
        Get the handle to the monitor instance singleton.
        Returns:
        - Monitor singleton.
        Throws:
        Monitor.MonitorException
